page_content: ## Relevant Ghanaian policies on nationally determined contributions, long-term strategies, national adaptation plans, strategies as reported in adaptation communications and national communications - Ghana’s Updated Nationally Determined Contribution to the UNFCCC_2021 - identifies emission reduction and adaptation actions to be undertaken between 2020 and 2030 in the energy, transportation, agriculture, forestry and land use, waste, and industry sectors. - National Climate Change Policy (NCCP) - seeks to enhance climate resilience and adaptation across all sectors.
